wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Edward Clarke (born 18 December 1980) is an English footballer who plays as a defender.

response: * Chris Clarke (croquet player) (born 1971), English croquet player
* Chris Clarke (politician) (1941–2009), British Liberal Democrat politician
* Chris Clarke (EastEnders), fictional character on BBC soap opera EastEnders
He is the twin brother of fellow footballer Chris Clarke.
